title: Who is the most toxic champ in LoL
body:
just wondering what opinions people have on which champ is the most toxic, some of the choices I added in the poll might never get a vote and some might not be included, but I made the choices based on what people tell me is toxic.

Not necessarily OP, just really trolly or frustrating.

Honestly, I think it's a tie between Fizz, Yasuo and LeBlanc.

replies.body: {{champion:17}}
lol look at cassiopeia.
{{champion:29}}  <-- toxic too

Idk, i'd say {{champion:27}} is also very toxic.
Also let's not forget {{champion:36}}.
Literally full toxic kit.
ok lets face its {{champion:92}} even the players playing her are toxic riot stated a few years ago that over 50% of riven players get banned for being toxic
all assassin "mains" are toxic
I play {{champion:24}} as a assassin and im not a toxic  player well as long as my whole team don't go 0 12  0 wen im 20 0 0 lol
i cant tell from that. a suboptimal build doesnt always mean toxicity indeed

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QusYNVVx,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-27T11:40:27.819+0000)
>
> i cant tell from that. a suboptimal build doesnt always mean toxicity indeed

Should I start building Rengar as a tank so I am not stereotyped by your generalization?

yer time to go full tank {{champion:1}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:11}} and so on just cos being a assassin makes you toxic you wona know wot makes a assassin toxic wen some dick ses there toxic have no skill so on that makes them mad lets face it
{{champion:412}}
{{champion:35}}

{{champion:157}}, only people with no understanding of the game think that, he is the 2nd hardest champ in the game to do well with, not my problem you can't figure out how fight them, its pretty easy actually
It's not easy with delayed skillshot champs or slow projectile champs. Even then, a single mistake with wind wall gives the yas player a chance to spam ctrl4 about 1000 times.
actually, his w needs to be used 75 units ahead of the projectile, or directly on it (standing in it and firing through the wall), otherwise it wont block
Yes, and have you seen Lissandra, Anivia or Ekko's (at max range) projectiles? I do try to bait him out first though.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QusYNVVx,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-08-27T10:43:34.501+0000)
>
> actually, his w needs to be used 75 units ahead of the projectile, or directly on it (standing in it and firing through the wall), otherwise it wont block

It can also miss which is funny, especially when you play him and you have no clue why Xreath got his stun off into full combo.

Good fucking times

(Jk, I always move to dodge it as a first response and only wall if that wont be possible or I know it will hit)
I hate it when projectiles go through the wall. also funfact. know ziggs ult? if you cross your w along its mouth and between the face eyes, it will block the spell

WAT ABOUT MASTER YI???
BROKEN + TOXIC = **Insert satan here**

Platnium V players
Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven

Yasuo Master Yi Garen Katarina

Toxicest

I find his lazer to be pree frustrating.

She is broken, and not in the op sense...

unless you stick to bird form more often then not

> She is broken

No kidding. She's got about a dozen bugs that (still) need fixing.

Definitely going with Yorick. The only champion with gameplay so toxic that he actually got removed from free week rotation. He isn't op outside of laning but during that phase he has your balls in quite the firm grip.
hahahah so true he likes balls
are you trolling that you missed kat.....
maximum of 10 choices in a poll.
A good Fizz player can be incredibly frustrating to lane against!
Shaco, rengar, stealth junglers in general.
Toxic in kit or players? Players would be ADC if Champ it's so Teemo.
